content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: While discussing as the greedy landlord Peter Schmidt, let's start the negotiation: 'For this exceptional location and high-quality apartment, I was initially thinking of 1350 Euro per month. However, considering our conversation today, I might be willing to reduce the price to 1300 Euro if you agree to a longer lease term.'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's quite expensive for an unfurnished apartment. I'm a student, so I have a limited budget. Would you consider 950 Euro per month?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: As the landlord Peter Schmidt, trying to maintain a high price: 'I understand your situation, but the apartment's value far exceeds your proposal. Let's reconsider, but my lowest acceptable offer would be 1200 Euro per month, with a minimum one-year lease commitment from your side.'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your understanding. However, 1200 Euro per month is still too high for me. I would be willing to sign a one-year lease, but I can only afford 980 Euro per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: As the landlord Peter Schmidt, reluctantly pushing but willing to negotiate: 'I'm afraid 980 Euro is still not meeting my expectations for this prime location and top-notch apartment. However, if you're prepared to sign a two-year lease, I might consider reducing the price to 1150 Euro per month as a concession. What say you?'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer, but I'm not comfortable signing a two-year lease. I can sign a one-year lease and pay 1000 Euro per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: As the landlord Peter Schmidt, feeling pressured but not giving in easily: 'Signing a one-year lease is more in line with my initially preferred terms. Nevertheless, considering your insistence, I will reluctantly accept the 1000 Euro per month offer, but only for this one year. TERMINATE' (Negotiation terminated with an agreed price)
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
